A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This was an average SW movie.  Better effects and acting than episodes 1-3\, but the dialogue and writing were similarly poor.  

Luke was out of character and given rotten lines\, and the jokes were too 21st century to be from a galaxy far far away.  The Snoke CGI was poor\, particularly when he stood up and walked.  Leia flying through space made me cringe.  

Many scenes were amazing\, mostly the battle sequences\, and Rey is a great hero.  Chewy\, BB8\, and R2 are always a pleasure to watch.  The actors all did well with what they were given.
